title: Creamy Wild Rice and Chicken Chowder
ingredients: ['30g butter', '1 onion, chopped', '2 sticks celery, chopped', '2 carrots, chopped', '250g uncooked wild rice', '2L chicken stock', '1 bay leaves', '125ml double cream', '150g cooked chicken, diced', 'salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste']
